#summary Overview

= Introduction =

So this project came about a [http://www.ibm.com/developerworks/library/os-weathermaps/index.html post] I read at IBM one day on making your own weather alerts with GD.  This is an attempt at writing my own radar analysis package to track and predict thunderstorm cells.



= Details =

The project is divided into several parts:

*daemon*
Downloads and archives radar reflectivity and velocity images from NOAA.

*analysis*
Analyses radar images and stores data in an sqlite database.

*UI*
User interface to view radar images and metadata.
